attributes.value: Sees friendship as one of the finer things in life
Values honesty
Sees those that attempt to maintain dignified and proper behavior as vain and offensive
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Respects perseverance
Finds romance distasteful
Is rarely jealous
Is very slow to anger
Is impervious to the effects of stress
Only rarely feels strong cravings or urges
Doesn't mind a little tumult and discord in day-to-day living
Has a tendency to go it alone, without considering the advice of others
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Has an overinflated sense of self-worth
Always acts with mercy and compassion at the forefront of her considerations
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Is swayed by emotional appeals
Weak
Quite durable
Little willpower
Meager creativity
Bad intuition
